title: Typography System
description:
Create a type scale and typography system.

## Requirements

1. Set up the body:
   - Font family: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif
   - Font size: 16px (base)
   - Line height: 1.5
   - Color: #333

2. Style headings with a type scale:
   - h1: 3rem, font-weight 700, line-height 1.2
   - h2: 2.25rem, font-weight 600, line-height 1.25
   - h3: 1.5rem, font-weight 600, line-height 1.3
   - All headings: color #111, margin-bottom 0.5em

3. Style `.text-small`:
   - Font size: 0.875rem
   - Color: #666

4. Style `.text-large`:
   - Font size: 1.25rem
   - Line height: 1.6

5. Style `blockquote`:
   - Font size: 1.125rem
   - Font style: italic
   - Border left: 4px solid #ddd
   - Padding left: 1rem
   - Color: #555

testCases.description: body should use system font stack

hints: Group shared heading styles with h1, h2, h3 selector
Use margin-bottom: 0.5em (em unit) for relative spacing
